channel.title: I got so many questions
channel.description:
hi... here is info i know about making a private server :rolleyes:
i know how to spawn npc..
i know how to make myself npc...
.. thats it lol :(
but here are my questions: how do you make npc'stalk?, how do i makemyself admin?, how do i put my server up for others to go on?, how do i make ancients work? how do i make a training area for peopleto get exp (how do i get there lvl's down to lvl 1?) how do i make shops? how do i make monsters drop specialitemsiwant them to? ...and the most annoying question.... whenever i attack an npc.. it always dies its weird... how do i make health.. :| and last but not least... how do i make special teleporting areas in the emote boxes :eek:
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 09:38:26 PM[/size][hr]oh ye and how do i make wildy in special areas? :o[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 09:39:25 PM[/size][hr]uhh anybody there?
